org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.blockmanagement

Class BlockInfoContiguousUnderConstruction.ReplicaUnderConstruction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.protocol.Block
      • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.blockmanagement.BlockInfoContiguousUnderConstruction.ReplicaUnderConstruction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Block>, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable
    Enclosing class:
    BlockInfoContiguousUnderConstruction

    static class BlockInfoContiguousUnderConstruction.ReplicaUnderConstruction
extends Block
    ReplicaUnderConstruction contains information about replicas while they are under construction. The GS, the length and the state of the replica is as reported by the data-node. It is not guaranteed, but expected, that data-nodes actually have corresponding replicas.

    • Method Detail

      • getExpectedStorageLocation

        private DatanodeStorageInfo getExpectedStorageLocation()
        Expected block replica location as assigned when the block was allocated. This defines the pipeline order. It is not guaranteed, but expected, that the data-node actually has the replica.

      • getState

        HdfsServerConstants.ReplicaState getState()
        Get replica state as reported by the data-node.
